nodes.text: Captain Rondell was a man, who served in Alliance Intelligence during the Galactic Civil War.

During the conflict, the Alliance agent Fulkrehm Protial proposed to Rondell that he be allowed to go on an undercover mission to the bar Sangorn's Net. Rondell didn't see the merits of the assignment, but agreed to to it, as he could see that Protial felt trapped.
